page.title: 08The River Itchen
page.content: The{River Itchen}flows over{chalkland. The bottom is covered with{river weed. The fish living in the river are {Trout,Rainbow Trout,Pike,Eels}and Minnow.The River Itchen runs through Alresford,Itchen Stoke,Itchen Abbas and Easton flowing towards its mouth at{Southampton Water. There are{two sources}to the river,one at{Kilmeston}and one at{Alresford. We dropped a leave in to the river and {calculated}the speed of the river.It reached 2.7KM/PH.When you are on the bridge the river looked as if it was flowing slowly. The{surroundings}make it{shady}because of the{trees}and reeds.The width of the river was{measurered by a metre tape it was{12 metres.The width}of the bridge is{3.75metres approxamatly. By DAVID BIRCH AND ELIZABETH COFFEN
